languages.text: {n}Над головами взлетает истошный вопль: "Бей еретиков!" Спустя миг бушующая толпа уже рвет, бьет и топчет троицу подстрекателей, превращая их в месиво плоти и костей. Неправильно! Они нужны мне живыми!{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Толпа начинает бушевать и бить демагогов
Толпа начинает бушевать и бить демагогов

languages.text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Над головами взлетает истошный вопль: "Бей еретиков!" Спустя миг бушующая толпа уже рвет, бьет и топчет троицу подстрекателей, превращая их в месиво плоти и костей. Неправильно! Они нужны мне живыми!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above our heads: " Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob is already tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, turning them into a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

{n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

{n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein heiserer Schrei erhebt sich über ihren Köpfen: "Streckt die Ketzer nieder!" Binnen Sekunden schlägt, zertrampelt und zerreißt die tobende Menge die drei Abweichler und macht aus ihnen eine undefinierbare Masse aus Fleisch und Knochen. Das ist falsch! Ich brauche sie lebend!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein heiserer Schrei erhebt sich über ihren Köpfen: "Streckt die Ketzer nieder!" Binnen Sekunden schlägt, zertrampelt und zerreißt die tobende Menge die drei Abweichler und macht aus ihnen eine undefinierbare Masse aus Fleisch und Knochen. Das ist falsch! Ich brauche sie lebend!"{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un chillido ronco se alza sobre sus cabezas: «¡Acabad con los herejes!». En unos instantes, la turba empieza a arrancar, golpear y pisotear a los tres sublevados, reduciéndolos a una masa de carne y huesos. ¡No! ¡Los necesito con vida!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un chillido ronco se alza sobre sus cabezas: «¡Acabad con los herejes!». En unos instantes, la turba empieza a arrancar, golpear y pisotear a los tres sublevados, reduciéndolos a una masa de carne y huesos. ¡No! ¡Los necesito con vida!{/n}

languages.text: {n}「異端者を打ちのめせ！」というしわがれた悲鳴が上がる。一瞬にして怒り狂う暴徒は3人の反逆者を引き裂き、殴り、踏みつけ、肉と骨しかない塊に変えてしまう。まずい！彼らを生かしておかなければ！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「異端者を打ちのめせ！」というしわがれた悲鳴が上がる。一瞬にして怒り狂う暴徒は3人の反逆者を引き裂き、殴り、踏みつけ、肉と骨しかない塊に変えてしまう。まずい！彼らを生かしておかなければ！{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们头顶传来了一声沙哑的尖叫：“干掉这些异端分子！”话音刚落，愤怒的暴民就开始撕扯这三名煽动者。人们对他们饱以老拳，将他们踩在脚下，把他们化为一团血肉。可这样的结果是错误的！我要留他们的活口！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们头顶传来了一声沙哑的尖叫：“干掉这些异端分子！”话音刚落，愤怒的暴民就开始撕扯这三名煽动者。人们对他们饱以老拳，将他们踩在脚下，把他们化为一团血肉。可这样的结果是错误的！我要留他们的活口！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un cri rauque s'élève au-dessus de leurs têtes : « Mort aux hérétiques ! » En quelques instants, la foule enragée se met à déchirer, frapper et écraser les trois séditieux, les réduisant à un amas de chair et d'os. Non ! Il me les faut vivants !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un cri rauque s'élève au-dessus de leurs têtes : « Mort aux hérétiques ! » En quelques instants, la foule enragée se met à déchirer, frapper et écraser les trois séditieux, les réduisant à un amas de chair et d'os. Non ! Il me les faut vivants !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yukarıdan boğuk bir çığlık yükseliyor: "Kâfirlere ölüm!" Öfkeden köpüren kalabalık; dakikalar içinde üç isyancıyı parçalamaya, yumruklamaya ve çiğnemeye başlıyor. İsyancılardan geriye et ve kemikten başka bir şey kalmıyor. Böyle olmaması gerek! Onlar bana canlı lazım!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A hoarse shriek rises above their heads: "Strike down the heretics!" Within moments, the raging mob begins tearing, punching, and trampling the three seditionists, reducing them to nothing but a mass of flesh and bone. This is wrong! I need them alive!{/n}
